snippet: The bank doubled the amount by which the renminbi would be permitted to rise or fall each day, making it more responsive to market forces.
abstract: China's Central Bank will double amount by which renminbi will be permitted to rise or fall each day, move that could lead to wider daily price fluctuations; announcement offers latest indication that China is determined to make its currency an international one and to give market forces a larger role in its economy.
lead_paragraph: The bank doubled the amount by which the renminbi would be permitted to rise or fall each day, making it more responsive to market forces.

headline.main: China’s Central Bank Allows Its Currency More Volatility
